txt.en: Skunkwood must have high hopes for you.  Good luck in there.'
'You've made a fool out of me for the last time, traitor!'
'There's the chest they put it in!'
'My stick. I would be lost without it.'
'Skunkwood says it's all right. I'll let you pass.'
The Blackwold guard stares up at you from beneath a furrowed brow. He spits onto the ground and studies your face for a few seconds before giving you a wry and sinister smile.

'The wound... it is so cold....

'The voice... the voice speaks to me. Commands me. Tells me things. Tells me about the end of all things...the beginning of new things. It calls me...it calls me to service....

'I must do what it says... must follow.... I serve... I must serve the Dark Lord....'

'Goodness me, what a terrible sight for these old eyes! The blade that stung Amdir has done its work, and I fear he's nothing more than a servant of the Enemy now. You should try and stop him, if you can.\n\n'And don't worry about me. Now that I'm free of that awful cell, I'll be fine. And I've got my stick back. Don't know what I'd have done without it.'
'I'd be careful though, that Amdir's a dangerous one.'

'Ah, so you're the one I've heard so much about from Ellie. We lost a lot of good men in Archet, and I'll be glad to have you in the fold.

'You say you've heard about that Ranger? I have to tell you, what is happening to that fellow is plain unnatural. Éogan tells me he'll be a great boon to us, but for now he's just a raving madman.

'I don't mind letting you go take a peek in on him. He's down in the dungeon at the far end of the cavern. My guard there will let you pass.'

Toradan coughs up blood. 'Amdir is... beyond saving now. You must warn... my kindred....'

'Mundol is in the Mustering Cave of the Rangers. He... help him....

'Go to Underhill... ask him if... if Tanglerush delivered my message....'
Sara Oakheart has been defeated. You have failed.

'Oh, thank you for coming to save me, young one! I have been held captive here for a long time! I have seen many things, and if you would be so kind as to help me out of this dungeon, I would be able to tell you a bit of what happened to your friend Amdir.'
You have safely escorted Sara Oakheart
'What have they done? Quickly, with me!'
Toradan sent you to Skunkwood's hideout to rescue Amdir and put an end to the Blackwolds' mischief.
'All of you! Stay back! It is too late for him!'
'I am sorry, my friend, but I must end this....'
'You have done me a great service this day.'
Help Sara Oakheart out of the cave
'They took something very important from me, friend: my stick! I need to go get it!'
'You must be the new blood Ellie was talking about.'

Speak to the Blackwold guard. If your ruse is successful, he should give you access to the hideout.\n\nToradan sent you to Skunkwood's hideout to rescue Amdir and put an end to the Blackwolds' mischief.
Skunkwood resides somewhere within the hideout.\n\nYou have tricked your way into the Blackwolds' hideout. Now you must find Skunkwood and speak with him to learn the whereabouts of Amdir.

Amdir lies in the dungeons at the far end of the Blackwold hideout.\n\nSkunkwood told you that Amdir was locked away and that what was happening to him seemed unnatural. You should find Amdir quickly.
You have discovered Amdir and found that he has partially transformed into a wraith. He stopped raving at the sight of you, so perhaps there is still some hope for him.

An old woman in the back of the cell that held Amdir called to you for help. You should help her escape.\n\nWhatever is happening to Amdir, it has driven him completely mad, and he is far more powerful than he first seemed. His deafening scream momentarily stunned you and threw open his cell door.
Try to help Toradan defeat Amdir.\n\nAs neared the entrance of the Blackwold Hideout, you encountered Toradan and Amdir.

After helping Sara Oakheart out of the Blackwold hideout, Toradan entered and saw what had become of Amdir. Seeing his kinsman too far gone to help, Toradan attempted to slay him, but was instead himself stricken down.\n\nYou should speak with Toradan before he perishes.

Toradan spoke about Amdir trying to kill the other Rangers and asked you to speak with Constable Underhill about a message he sent to someone named Tanglerush.\n\nBefore leaving the hideout, however, you should speak to Sara Oakheart again to see if she needs any further help.
'Is this the compassion of the Dúnedain?'
'The voice... the voice told the truth!'
'This will take me just one moment.'
'By the Valar! It is too late!'
'I shall end you, Toradan, my brother...'
'It will be good to see the sky again! Let us get going, shall we?'
'Goodness, it sounds like there's trouble ahead!'
'Unless Skunkwood has given his blessing, you can't go in here!'
'Go speak to William Skunkwood at the other end of the cave, then I'll let you in.'
'Hey! Get out of here. Only people with the permission can come in here!'
